title: How to save your battery  power?
answer:
The below method could help you save your battery Power:
?Use only 2G network
Setting：Settings->wireless controls->mobile network->Use only 2G network (enable)
?Disable Data service
Setting：Settings->wireless controls->mobile network->Data service
?Adjust the brightness of Screen(<1/3)
Setting：Settings->sound & display->Brightness
?Adjust the screen automatically turn off time (30s-60s)
?Disable Bluetooth
?Disable WLAN
?Disable GPS Satellites
?Adjust the media volume
?Turn off applications when it`s on idlesse status
